join_verse.invited_desc: Dirk Markus, Chief Financial Officer, invites you to join the Verse of BrightNetWorks GmbH.
join_verse.almost_done_desc: Before you can store and manage content, you need to join a Verse. You can ask your company's administrator for an invitation, or create a new Verse.
join_verse.welcome_title: Welcome to the Verse of BrightNetWorks!
join_verse.welcome_desc: Great, you joined the Verse of BrightNetWorks as an Expert. Are you ready to learn more about your new role?

role.title: Your role as Expert
role.intro: As an Expert, you help keep your organization's valuable content up to date, structured and ready for use at any time.
role.bullet_1: You can upload assets such as images, texts or data
role.bullet_2: You can edit and enrich assets
role.bullet_3: You can assign assets to channels (book, website, etc.)
role.bullet_4: You can prepare content and request approval
role.hint: Note: Your organization might have specific approval policies. Only upload or edit content that has been approved by your team. Handle structures and data in this protected Verse carefully and responsibly.
role.cta: I understand my role – let's start
